alert.note: Alert for Harmon (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 9:09PM CDT until July 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR JACKSON...SOUTHEASTERN HARMON AND SOUTH CENTRAL GREER COUNTIES... At 908 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles west of Martha to 4 miles southeast of Duke to near Eldorado, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Altus, Olustee, Martha, Gould, Elmer, Headrick, Friendship, Altus Air Force Base, Humphreys, Duke, and McQueen. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
